background.description: The general bacground for the main App container

focus.description: External focus effect. Works fine in most cases.

selection.description: External selection effect. You can use it to highlight a selected object to make the selection more visible. E.g.: Avatar Group

smooth.description: Smooth timing function used in 0.3s animations

section-headline.description: The main font sets are added as global (sys) values and can be used as reference for other font styles

card-title.description: The main font sets are added as global (sys) values and can be used as reference for other font styles

card-subtitle.description: The main font sets are added as global (sys) values and can be used as reference for other font styles

group-header.description: The main font sets are added as global (sys) values and can be used as reference for other font styles

body.description: The main font sets are added as global (sys) values and can be used as reference for other font styles

body-strong.description: The main font sets are added as global (sys) values and can be used as reference for other font styles

body-link.description: The main font sets are added as global (sys) values and can be used as reference for other font styles

caption.description: The main font sets are added as global (sys) values and can be used as reference for other font styles

caption-link.description: The main font sets are added as global (sys) values and can be used as reference for other font styles

shadow.description: Focus style designed specifically for side navigation.

radius.description: Radius for segmented control item. {container radius} - 3
Border-radius for the 'Rounded' variant of the Skeleton component

radius-between.description: Resets border radius for internal buttons

regular.description: Use this token when you don't have a specific font style, but want to re-/apply both font-family and font-weight

any-weight.description: Use, when you don't want to specify the font weight
